original_title: Da`im or: The Sound that the Mother Makes When Her Babies Break
overview: Man, betrayed by the hollow echoes of his hammer, smashes the sphere to reveal the vehicle away from the hole, towards the hole. The inescapable gift of fertility fulfills his ultimate duty to make the world obscure again in order to reclaim what was known.
title: Da`im or: The Sound that the Mother Makes When Her Babies Break
